debates.showAs: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for a process for the disregard of certain historic criminal convictions arising from consensual sexual activity between men; to amend the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le próiseas chun neamhaird a thabhairt ar chiontuithe coiriúla stairiúla áirithe a d’eascair as gníomhaíocht ghnéasach chomhthoiliúil idir fir; do leasú an Achta fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Neamhaird a Thabhairt ar Chionta Stairiúla i dtaobh Gníomhaíocht Ghnéasach Chomhthoiliúil Idir Fir, 2025

debates.showAs: Competition and Consumer Protection (Unfair Prices) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Competition and Consumer Protection (Unfair Prices) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable and assist the Competition and Consumer Protection Commission better to perform its functions in relation to protecting consumers from abuse by undertakings of a dominant position by imposing unfair purchase prices, for that purpose to amend the Competition and Consumer Protection Act 2014, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Choimisiún um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí, agus do chuidiú leis, na feidhmeanna atá aige, ar feidhmeanna iad i ndáil le tomhaltóirí a chosaint ar ghnóthais do bhaint mí-úsáid as ceannasacht trí phraghsanna ceannaigh éagóracha a fhorchur, a chomhlíonadh ar bhealach níos fearr, chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí, 2014, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Competition and Consumer Protection (Unfair Prices) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí (Praghsanna Éagóracha), 2023

debates.showAs: River Boyne Task Force Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a committee of the Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly to serve as a River Boyne Task Force with the function of proposing and promoting policies and priorities for the protection and enhancement of the environment of the River Boyne and of its natural habitats and wildlife and the co-ordination of the activities of public authorities in relation thereto; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú coiste de chuid Thionól Réigiúnach an Oirthir agus Lár Tíre chun fónamh mar Thascfhórsa na Bóinne agus é d'fheidhm aige beartais agus tosaíochtaí a mholadh agus a chur chun cinn chun comhshaol na Bóinne a chosaint agus a fheabhsú, mar aon lena gnáthóga nádúrtha agus a fiadhúlra, agus chun gníomhaíochtaí údarás poiblí i ndáil leis an gcéanna a chomhordú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: River Boyne Task Force Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thascfhórsa na Bóinne, 2023

debates.showAs: Ministers and Secretaries (Attorney General) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ministers and Secretaries (Attorney General) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make further provision in relation to the office of the Attorney General.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú breise i ndáil le hoifig an Ard-Aighne.
bill.shortTitleEn: Ministers and Secretaries (Attorney General) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Airí agus Rúnaithe (An tArd-Aighne), 2023

debates.showAs: Central Bank (Variable Rate Mortgages) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for measures to address market failures in the market for principal dwelling house mortgage loans, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le bearta chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar mhainneachtana margaidh sa mhargadh d’iasachtaí morgáiste ar phríomhthithe cónaithe, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Central Bank (Variable Rate Mortgages) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille an Bhainc Ceannais (Morgáistí Ráta Athraithigh), 2022

debates.showAs: Autism Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Autism Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an autism strategy to be prepared and published, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le straitéis uathachais a ullmhú agus a fhoilsiú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Autism Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Uathachais, 2022

debates.showAs: Education (Admission to Schools) (Co-Education) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to disapply at separate future dates, in relation to recognised primary and post-primary schools, the exemption provided by certain enactments from the prohibition against discrimination on the gender ground in educational establishments, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an díolúine a fhoráiltear le hachtacháin áirithe, is díolúine ón toirmeasc ar idirdhealú ar an bhforas inscne i mbunachais oideachais, a dhífheidhmiú ar dhátaí ar leithligh sa todhchaí i ndáil le bunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna aitheanta, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Education (Admission to Schools) (Co-Education) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Ligean Isteach i Scoileanna) (Comhoideachas), 2022

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled Act to provide for the automatic extension of notice periods with respect to residential tenancies where a tenant is certified as at risk of homelessness and for that purpose to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhsí fógra a fhadú go huathoibríoch maidir le tionóntachtaí cónaithe i gcás go ndeimhnítear go bhfuil tionónta i mbaol na heaspa dídine agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) (Extension of Notice Periods) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) (Tréimhsí Fógra a Fhadú), 2021

debates.showAs: Pensions (Amendment) (Transparency in Charges) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Pensions (Amendment) (Transparency in Charges) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for greater transparency in relation to charges that may be imposed in the administration of pension schemes, for that purpose to amend the Pensions Act 1990, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trédhearcacht níos mó i ndáil le muirir a fhéadfar a fhorchur i riaradh scéimeanna pinsean, chun na críche sin, do leasú Acht na bPinsean, 1990, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Pensions (Amendment) (Transparency in Charges) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na bPinsean (Leasú) (Trédhearcacht i Muirir), 2021

debates.showAs: Labour Exploitation and Trafficking (Audit of Supply Chains) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Labour Exploitation and Trafficking (Audit of Supply Chains) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for transparent reporting by undertakings in relation to the risk of labour exploitation and human trafficking occurring in their supply chains or in any part of their business and of the steps taken by them to ensure such activities do not take place; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tuairisciú trédhearcach ag gnóthais i ndáil leis an mbaol go dtarlóidh dúshaothrú saothair agus gáinneáil ar dhaoine ina gcuid slabhraí soláthair nó in aon chuid dá ngnó agus i dtaobh na mbeart a dhéanfaidh siad chun a chinntiú nach dtarlóidh gníomhaíochtaí den sórt sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Labour Exploitation and Trafficking (Audit of Supply Chains) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhúshaothrú Saothair agus Gáinneáil (Slabhraí Soláthair a Iniúchadh), 2021

debates.showAs: Consumer Protection (Loyalty Penalty and Customer Complaints) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit differential pricing in respect of certain subscription service supplied to consumers; to require certain traders to establish schemes for handling consumer complaints in relation to their services and to prescribe minimum standards in relation to such schemes; for those purposes to amend the Consumer Protection Act 2007; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc praghsáil dhifreálach i leith seirbhísí síntiúis áirithe a sholáthraítear do thomhaltóirí; dá cheangal ar thrádálaithe áirithe scéimeanna a bhunú chun gearáin ó chustaiméirí i ndáil lena gcuid seirbhísí a láimhseáil agus chun caighdeáin íosta a fhorordú i ndáil le scéimeanna den sórt sin; chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí, 2007; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Consumer Protection (Loyalty Penalty and Customer Complaints) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí (Pionós Dílseachta agus Gearáin ó Chustaiméirí), 2021

debates.showAs: Measuring Quality of Life in Ireland Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to confer functions on the Central Statistics Office and the National Economic and Social Council in relation to the publication of indices, to be known as Genuine Progress Indicators, designed to take fuller account of the quality of life and well-being of the community by incorporating environmental and social factors, in relation to the publication of National Distributional Accounts that aim to measure the distribution of national income and economic growth and in relation to an annual report on the impact of the Budget on economic and social inequality, poverty reduction and income and wealth redistribution; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt feidhmeanna don Phríomh-Oifig Staidrimh agus don Chomhairle Náisiúnta Eacnamaíoch agus Sóisialach i ndáil le hinnéacsanna a fhoilsiú, ar a dtabharfar Táscairí maidir le Dul Chun Cinn Iarbhír, a bheidh ceaptha chun cáilíocht saoil agus leas an phobail a chur i gcuntas ar shlí níos iomláine trí thosca comhshaoil agus sóisialta a áireamh, i ndáil le Cuntais Dáiliúcháin Náisiúnta a fhoilsiú arb é is cuspóir leo dáileadh an ioncaim náisiúnta agus fás eacnamaíoch a thomhas agus i ndáil le tuarascáil bhliantúil maidir le tionchar an Bhuiséid ar mhíchothromaíocht eacnamaíoch agus shóisialta, ar laghdú na bochtaineachta agus ar athdháileadh ioncaim agus saibhris; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Measuring Quality of Life in Ireland Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cháilíocht Saoil in Éirinn a Thomhas, 2020

debates.showAs: Working from Home (Covid-19) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Working from Home (Covid-19) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide employees working remotely with a right to switch off from out of working hours work-related electronic communications, to disapply subject to conditions certain provisions of the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 in the case of certain employees working temporarily from home, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt ceart d’fhostaithe atá ag obair go cianda dícheangal ó chumarsáid leictreonach a bhaineann leis an obair lasmuigh d’uaireanta oibre, do dhífheidhmiú forálacha áirithe den Acht um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005, faoi réir coinníollacha, i gcás fostaithe áirithe atá ag obair sa bhaile go sealadach, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Working from Home (Covid-19) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Obair sa Bhaile (Covid-19), 2020

debates.showAs: Regulation of Lobbying (Post-Term Employment as Lobbyist) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Regulation of Lobbying (Post-Term Employment as Lobbyist) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Regulation of Lobbying (Post-Term Employment as Lobbyist) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make further provision in relation to restrictions on the post-term employment of certain persons as lobbyists, for that purpose to amend the Regulation of Lobbying Act 2015, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú breise i ndáil le srianta ar fhostaíocht iarthéarma daoine áirithe mar bhrústocairí, chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta um Stocaireacht a Rialáil, 2015, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Regulation of Lobbying (Post-Term Employment as Lobbyist) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Stocaireacht a Rialáil (Fostaíocht Iar-Théarma mar Bhrústocaire), 2020

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Sectoral Employment Orders Confirmation) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give statutory effect to recommendations of the Labour Court in relation to pay and conditions in certain sectors of the economy; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt éifeacht reachtúil do mholtaí ón gCúirt Oibreachais i ndáil le pá agus coinníollacha in earnálacha áirithe den gheilleagar; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Industrial Relations (Sectoral Employment Orders Confirmation) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Orduithe Fostaíochta Earnála a Dhaingniú), 2020

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed)
Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions relating to the constitution of joint labour committees, so as to provide for cases where organisations of employers or of workers fail or refuse to engage in consultation with the Labour Court prior to the appointment of representative (employers) members or representative (workers) members, as the case may be; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na bhforálacha a bhaineann le comhdhéanamh comhchoistí oibreachais d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cásanna ina mainníonn nó ina ndiúltaíonn eagraíochtaí fostóirí nó eagraíochtaí oibrithe gabháil do chomhchomhairliúchán leis an gCúirt Oibreachais sula gceapfar comhaltaí ionadaíocha (fostóirí) nó comhaltaí ionadaíocha (oibrithe), de réir mar a bheidh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Comhchoistí Oibreachais), 2019

debates.showAs: Public Sector (Plain Language) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to improve access to public sector information and services by requiring plain writing in published documents; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’fheabhsú na rochtana ar fhaisnéis agus ar sheirbhísí earnála poiblí trína cheangal go mbeidh scríobh soiléir i ndoiciméid fhoilsithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Public Sector (Plain Language) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Earnáil Phoiblí (Teanga Shoiléir), 2019

debates.showAs: Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: Committee Stage (Resumed)
Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law in relation to applications for a certificate of naturalisation by minors born in the island of Ireland; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí i ndáil le hiarratais ar dheimhniú eadóirseachta ó mhionaoisigh a rugadh in oileán na hÉireann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille Náisiúntachta agus Saoránachta Éireann (Eadóirsiú Mionaoiseach a Rugadh in Éirinn), 2018

debates.showAs: Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to prohibit recognised schools, subject to certain exceptions, from charging admission or enrolment fees or from otherwise seeking contributions from parents towards meeting the costs and expenses incurred in providing education at that school; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc ar scoileanna aitheanta, faoi réir eisceachtaí áirithe, táillí maidir le ligean isteach nó rollú a mhuirearú nó ranníocaí a lorg ó thuismitheoirí thairis sin faoi chomhair íoc na gcostas agus na gcaiteachas arna dtabhú i soláthar an oideachais sa scoil sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shaoroideachas (Toirmeasc ar Tháillí agus ar Mhuirir), 2018

debates.showAs: Short-term Lettings Bill 2018: Second Stage
Short-term Lettings Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to declare the use of dwellings for short-term lettings to be used for commercial purposes; to remove the exemption of property services provided in connection with short-term lettings from the application of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011; to oblige persons who provide services in connection with short-term lettings of dwellings to furnish information upon request to the relevant planning authority; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhearbhú úsáid teaghaisí le haghaidh ligin ghearrthéarma a bheidh le húsáid chun críocha tráchtála; do chur deireadh le díolmhú seirbhísí maoine a sholáthraítear i dtaca le ligin ghearrthéarma ó fheidhm an Achta um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil), 2011; do chur oibleagáide ar dhaoine a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí i dtaca le ligin ghearrthéarma teaghaisí faisnéis a thabhairt don údarás pleanála iomchuí ar sin a iarraidh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Short-term Lettings Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ligin Ghearrthéarma 2018

debates.showAs: Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to declare the relationship between employer and employee to be a status relationship, to declare the question whether an individual is an employee or is self-employed to be a question of law to be independently determined, to provide that the description given by the parties shall not be conclusive in determining the true status of an employment relationship, to provide protection for persons who are retained to carry out work and are incorrectly not designated as employees, to take certain measures to counter the misrepresentation of the status of employees as if they were working under a contract for services rather than a contract of service, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá dhearbhú gur caidreamh stádais an caidreamh idir fostóir agus fostaí, dá dhearbhú gur ceist dlí í an cheist i dtaobh an fostaí nó an duine féinfhostaithe pearsa aonair, ar ceist dlí í a bheidh le cinneadh go neamhspleách, do dhéanamh socrú nach tuairisc chríochnaitheach an tuairisc a thabharfaidh na páirtithe le linn stádas fírinneach caidrimh fostaíochta a chinneadh, do chur cosaint ar fáil do dhaoine a fhostaítear chun obair a chur i gcrích agus nach ndéantar a ainmniú, mar ba chóir, mar fhostaithe, do dhéanamh bearta áirithe chun cur i gcoinne stádas fostaithe a mhífhaisnéisiú amhail is dá mba faoi chonradh le haghaidh seirbhísí a bheidís ag obair seachas faoi chonradh seirbhíse, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaomhnú Fostaíochta (Bearta chun Cur i gCoinne Bréag-Fhéinfhostaíochta), 2018

debates.showAs: Education (Welfare) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Report and Final Stages
Education (Welfare) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Committee Stage
Education (Welfare) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Education (Welfare) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the further coordination of the activities of the National Educational Welfare Board or, in the Irish language, an Bord Náisiúnta Leasa Oideachais, in so far as they relate to matters connected with  the  prevention  of  non-attendance on the part of certain students registered with recognised schools and for those and other purposes to amend the Education (Welfare) Act 2000 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le gníomhaíochtaí the National Educational Welfare Board nó, sa Ghaeilge, an Bhoird Náisiúnta Leasa Oideachais, a chomhordú tuilleadh a mhéid a bhaineann siad le nithe a ghabhann le cosc a chur le neamhfhreastal ar thaobh mic léinn áirithe atá cláraithe le scoileanna aitheanta agus chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críocha eile do leasú an Achta Oideachais (Leas), 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Education (Welfare) (Amendment) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Leas) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Order for Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Misuse of Drugs Acts 1977-2016 to provide for the decriminalisation for possession of controlled drugs for personal use and to provide for regulations regarding personal use; to establish a Drug Dissuasion Service to case-manage persons found in possession of controlled drugs and to divert people away from the courts by providing a system of harm reduction measures including drug awareness, drug rehabilitation and community engagement programmes; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 go 2016 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le díchoiriúlú a dhéanamh ar shealbhú drugaí rialaithe chun úsáide pearsanta agus chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le rialacháin a bhaineann le húsáid phearsanta; do bhunú Seirbhís Athchomhairliúcháin Drugaí chun daoine a bhfaightear drugaí rialaithe ina seilbh a chásbhainistiú agus chun daoine a athstiúradh ó na cúirteanna trí chóras de bhearta laghdaithe dochair a sholáthar, lena n-áirítear feasacht i leith drugaí, athshlánúchán ó dhrugaí agus cláir rannpháirtíochta pobail; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhrugaí Rialaithe agus um Dhochar a Laghdú, 2017

debates.showAs: Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Report and Final Stages
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require certain employers to publish information relating to the pay of employees for the purpose of showing whether there are differences in the pay of male and female employees and, if so, the nature and scale of such differences; for that purpose to amend the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar fhostóirí áirithe faisnéis a bhaineann le pá fostaithe a fhoilsiú chun a léiriú an bhfuil difríochtaí ann idir pá fostaithe fireanna agus pá fostaithe baineanna agus, más amhlaidh go bhfuil, chun cineál agus scála na ndifríochtaí sin a léiriú; chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas (Faisnéis faoin Difríocht Pá idir na hInscní), 2017

debates.showAs: Pensions (Equal Pension Treatment in Occupational Benefit Scheme) (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Pensions (Equal Pension Treatment in Occupational Benefit Scheme) (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions of the Pension Act 1990 relative to equal pension treatment in occupational benefit schemes in order to provide for cases where employees who were unable to marry persons of the same sex may be deprived of certain pension benefits, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú fhorálacha Acht na bPinsean, 1990 i ndáil le déileáil chomhionann i dtaca le pinsin i scéimeanna sochair ceirde d'fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cásanna ina bhféadfadh sé go gcoinneofaí sochair phinsin áirithe ó fhostaithe nach raibh in ann daoine den ghnéas céanna a phósadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Pensions (Equal Pension Treatment in Occupational Benefit Scheme) (Amendment) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na bPinsean (Déileáil Chomhionann i dtaca le Pinsin i Scéim Sochair Ceirde) (Leasú), 2016

debates.showAs: Convictions for Certain Sexual Offences (Apology and Exoneration) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Convictions for Certain Sexual Offences (Apology and Exoneration) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an apology to and exoneration of persons convicted of consensual same-sex sexual acts, on the grounds that prosecutions for such offences were improperly discriminatory, contrary to human dignity and in breach of personal privacy and autonomy; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leithscéal a ghabháil le daoine agus daoine a shaoradh, is daoine a ciontaíodh i ngníomhartha gnéasacha toiliúla idir daoine den ghnéas céanna, ar na forais go raibh ionchúisimh i gcionta den sórt sin idirdhealaitheach go míchuí, go raibh siad contrártha do dhínit an duine agus gur sháraigh siad an phríobháideacht phearsanta agus an fhéinriaracht phearsanta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Convictions for Certain Sexual Offences (Apology and Exoneration) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Gnéasacha Áirithe (Leithscéal a Ghabháil agus Saoradh), 2016

debates.showAs: Protection of Employment (Uncertain Hours) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Protection of Employment (Uncertain Hours) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide greater protection for employees by more effectually regulating zero hours and related employment practices; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun cosaint níos fearr a sholáthar d'fhostaithe trí rialáil níos éifeachtaí a dhéanamh ar chleachtais fostaíochta uaireanta nialais agus ar chleachtais fostaíochta ghaolmhara; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Employment (Uncertain Hours) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaomhnú Fostaíochta (Uaireanta Éiginnte), 2016
